name: part_004
file: tmp_【 #ReGLOSS3Dライブ 】Sakura Mirage ⧸ 新曲サクラミラージュ披露！【 ミニライブ 】 [qc2owX4GFwA]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_004.mov

scenes.description: Performance of the song 'Utakata Maybe' (泡沫メイビー).
Performance of the song 'Symmetry' (シンメトリー).
MC section where the members thank the audience and comment on the performance and the rain.

subtitles.original: メイビー
subtitles.english: Maybe

subtitles.original: まわれ右 今夜は分かれ道
subtitles.english: About-face, tonight is the crossroads

subtitles.original: 胸騒ぎ 泡沫メイビー
subtitles.english: Heart pounding, Utakata Maybe

subtitles.original: 繰り返しさよなら溜息
subtitles.english: Repeating goodbyes and sighs

subtitles.original: しびれるような真昼明けは
subtitles.english: After the electrifying noon

subtitles.original: ただじっと待っている Day & Night
subtitles.english: Just waiting still, Day & Night

subtitles.original: 雲と雲の切れ間から
subtitles.english: From between the clouds

subtitles.original: Rays of light shining
subtitles.english: Rays of light shining

subtitles.original: まわる後ろを振り返らないで
subtitles.english: Don't look back at the spinning rear

subtitles.original: そう呟いたんだ
subtitles.english: That's what I whispered

subtitles.original: シンメトリー
subtitles.english: Symmetry

subtitles.original: ざわめく街の喧騒
subtitles.english: The hustle and bustle of the noisy city

subtitles.original: かき消すように弦を弾いて
subtitles.english: Strumming the strings as if to drown it out

subtitles.original: 一心不乱に叫ぶ Go Go
subtitles.english: Shouting single-mindedly, Go Go

subtitles.original: 割れた爪を眺めてる暇もないよ
subtitles.english: No time to even look at broken nails

subtitles.original: 時の流れに飲み込まれたって
subtitles.english: Even if swallowed by the flow of time

subtitles.original: 立ちふさがる壁に真っ向から向かい打とう
subtitles.english: Let's face the standing wall head-on

subtitles.original: 万年未完成磨き続ければ マスターピース
subtitles.english: Forever incomplete, keep polishing it and it'll be a masterpiece

subtitles.original: 塗り潰してゆくイタダキ 努力だけは裏切らない
subtitles.english: The summit that's being painted over, only effort will not betray you

subtitles.original: 舞い手の全戦 インスパイア 先制
subtitles.english: The dancer's whole war, inspire, first move

subtitles.original: 枯れてる変電所 ずっとずっと低迷
subtitles.english: Withered substation, stagnation all the time

subtitles.original: 歯車外したド派手な今日
subtitles.english: Today, so flashy with the gears removed

subtitles.original: 静かに灯す青い炎
subtitles.english: A blue flame quietly lit

subtitles.original: 多少強引でもご愛嬌
subtitles.english: Even if it's a bit pushy, it's charming

subtitles.original: じっと見つめ合って
subtitles.english: Staring still at each other

subtitles.original: 駆け出せ旋律のように 恋い焦がれて先き乱れて
subtitles.english: Run like a melody, yearning and blooming wildly

subtitles.original: 失いかけた夢の 続きを紡いでいこう
subtitles.english: Let's spin the continuation of the dream we almost lost

subtitles.original: 乾いた世界を満たしてメロディ
subtitles.english: Fill the parched world, melody

subtitles.original: 行くよ一心同体
subtitles.english: Let's go, as one soul

subtitles.original: 君と重なるシンメトリー 手繰り寄せ朝日の方へ
subtitles.english: Symmetry overlapping with you, pulling towards the sunrise

subtitles.original: ほんの微妙なニュアンスの違い
subtitles.english: Just a subtle difference in nuance

subtitles.original: 絶妙なバランスの塩梅で
subtitles.english: With an exquisite balance

subtitles.original: すべての歯車たちは巧妙に噛み合っている
subtitles.english: All the gears are cleverly interlocking

subtitles.original: 数学より精密な値 迷い込んだ偏ったパラダイム
subtitles.english: Value more precise than math, a biased paradigm wandered into

subtitles.original: いつも隣り合わせのトライ これもきっと誰かの Another life
subtitles.english: A try that's always side-by-side, this must also be someone's Another life

subtitles.original: 君も未来も信じたい信じたい
subtitles.english: I want to believe, want to believe in you and the future

subtitles.original: 今だけここに拓け
subtitles.english: Only now, open up here

subtitles.original: 迫る終焉の足音 願いごとは儚くとも
subtitles.english: Footsteps of the approaching end, even if my wishes are fleeting

subtitles.original: 始まりの合図一歩 息をひそめて
subtitles.english: One step of the signal to start, holding my breath

subtitles.original: 静寂を切り裂いて 空へ翼はためかせて
subtitles.english: Cut through the silence, fluttering wings towards the sky

subtitles.original: 待ち望む結末に まばたきすらできないよ
subtitles.english: To the long-awaited conclusion, I can't even blink

subtitles.original: どんな風も傷も悲しみも Vivify
subtitles.english: Vivify any wind, wound, or sadness

subtitles.original: 寄せた火を飛び越え
subtitles.english: Jump over the fire we brought together

subtitles.original: まっさらな夜明けに秘めた思い もう後戻りはしない
subtitles.english: Thoughts hidden in the brand-new dawn, there's no turning back anymore

subtitles.original: 駆け出せ旋律のように 恋い焦がれて先き乱れて
subtitles.english: Run like a melody, yearning and blooming wildly

subtitles.original: 失いかけた夢の 続きを紡いでいこう
subtitles.english: Let's spin the continuation of the dream we almost lost

subtitles.original: 乾いた世界を満たしてメロディ 行くよ一心同体
subtitles.english: Fill the parched world, melody, let's go, as one soul

subtitles.original: 君と重なるシンメトリー 手繰り寄せ朝日の方へ
subtitles.english: Symmetry overlapping with you, pulling towards the sunrise

subtitles.original: ありがとうございます！
subtitles.english: Thank you very much!

subtitles.original: というわけでね、泡沫メイビーそしてシンメトリー聴いていただきました！
subtitles.english: So, we just performed Utakata Maybe and Symmetry!

subtitles.original: 雨が降ってきたからびしょ濡れだ！
subtitles.english: It started raining, so I'm soaking wet!

subtitles.original: 客席のみんな、雨に濡れましたか？
subtitles.english: Everyone in the audience, did you get wet in the rain?
